Phase21Description:
A thief named Darcel stole a Runic Charm needed to protect a sick mother and child. Without the charm, the family will surely perish. 

I must find Darcel and return the charm to Merryn in Braestaig.
Toast: A seemingly petty theft has put innocent lives at risk.
Phase9Description: I have dealt with the thief, Darcel, and should now return the Runic Charm to Merryn in Braestaig.
Name: Stolen Artifice
